name: Blöcks
description:
Blöcks is a VR puzzle game made for the Oculus Quest. Build electrical circuits with different Blocks to master increasingly difficult challenges. This is a free early alpha release.


🍕 Challenges
Each Challenge has objectives that require you to measure a certain current (Ampere) or voltage (Volts). To successfully complete a challenge, you need to build a circuit with the available Blocks and make sure it has the right current and voltage. 👩‍💻 Alpha Version
Blöcks is in early and active development, and this is an alpha version. It currently contains 3 Challenges and 6 Blocks (batteries, lamps, a switch and a wire). We're shipping updates multiple times each month, and the full release is planned for summer. Please don't hesitate reaching out to us with feedback or any bugs you might encounter. 💰 Pay-what-you-want
We offer the alpha for free, but you can choose to enter a  amount that supports the develoment of the game. All supporters will get free access to all subsequent updates, including the full release (which we'll price around $15). 🎉 Installation
Blöcks is only compatible with the Oculus Quest. After downloading the file, you can install ("sideload") it on your Quest via SideQuest or manually.💌 Stay up to date
The best place to follow us is on Twitter (@kosmosschool), but we also have a Discord. Our website is kosmosschool.com and you can always reach out via email, too: hello@kosmosschool.com 🤓 About us
We're Dorena and Can, just the two us creating nerdy VR games. Blöcks is our first game. We're from Switzerland, but currently live in Berlin. 💻 Source code
While we don't grant a license (yet), we've made the source of of Blöcks public here. Our intention with publishing our code is primarily educational. We hope that others who are starting to build VR apps might learn or get inspiration to solve a problem they're working on.
If you have any questions, or want permission to use our code differently, please contact us.
